author: mbearup
body: A version of powershell7 for Debian 10 (buster) is available [here](http://packages.microsoft.com/repos/microsoft-debian-buster-prod/pool/main/p/powershell-preview/). However, it depends on the Debian 9 (Stretch) versions of libicu and libssl (57 vs 63, and 1.0.2 vs 1.1 respectively). In its current state, this is not installable without pulling in old versions of the packages from Stretch, which is not recommended. Will you be building a version that depends on the newer versions of these packages?

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body:
It was fixed in #11236
Also we need you feedback here https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/11187#issuecomment-562714872

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body: This issue has been marked as duplicate and has not had any activity for **1 day**. It has been closed for housekeeping purposes.

title: Package dependency issue for Debian Buster
